channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lots of abandoned vehicles and rubbish dumped in a private car park, 20th September
item.description:
This issue has been reported several times, for untaxed and abandoned vehicles and to pest control, by several residents, but no action has been taken. The issue has been present for the two years I've lived here. The car park is private land, owned collectively by residents with parking spaces documented on deeds. None of the vehicles dumped in the car park belong to residents. There is now photographic evidence of blatant fly tipping. There are pests as the car park backs onto horses fields. Several of the vehicles are untaxed. The problem causes a huge problem for residents who struggle to find space to park their cars.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wyatt Road, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 49 Winston Road’s big tree’s leaves fall in my front garden and making stains., 20th September
item.description:
We have been cleaning for long time dry leave but I and my husband have heath issues. 49 Winston Road’s front garden is looks not good and trees are falling on my front garden. We don’t have good relations with them. Please help us to inform them to keep
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Winston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous parking!, 20th September
item.description:
Dear Sir/Madam, Rules 242, 243 & 250 the Highway Code is very clear that vehicles must be parked safely at least 10 metres away from a junction as can be seen here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/the-highway-code/waiting-and-parking-238-to-252 However as you can see from the attached photos the occupant of 52 Guibal Road SE12 routinely ignores this rule and parks dangerously to the extent it is not possible to safely exit the cul de sac that contains 10-40 Guibal Road SE12. https://www.google.com/maps/place/10+Guibal+Rd,+London+SE12+9LX/@51.4438262,0.018045,17z/data=!4m6!3m5!1s0x47d8a9ed00de6e4f:0x321b6c3d1484fe16!8m2!3d51.4438229!4d0.0206253!16s%2Fg%2F11c2c6fy5z?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDkxNi4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D Please do something as a matter of urgency before there is an accident and someone is injured or killed! Kindest regards

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Guibal Road, Horn Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose noisy manhole cover, 20th September
item.description:
The manhole cover pictured, on the street outside number 60/61 Dartmouth Road, is loose and makes a loud "clack clack" sound when vehicles drive over it. We live opposite and the noise is constant and annoying. It's been this way since we moved here in June this year.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61a, Dartmouth Road, Forest Hill, London

item.title: More or less where indicated, 20th September
item.description:
I reported this litter here last week and was told it will be cleared on the regular cleaning day. But there is no regular cleaning day for Coverdale Rd and it was not cleared. So could you please ask the guys once again to clear the leaves and litter at this location; both on the pavement and in the roadside Many thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coverdale Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
